scripts.postinstall: rm -rf ./node_modules/humanifyjs && git clone https://github.com/jehna/humanify.git ./node_modules/humanifyjs && cd ./node_modules/humanifyjs && npm install && npm run build
scripts.humanify-openai: for FILE in ./public/proprietary/*.js ; do if [[ ! -f "output/$(basename "$FILE")" ]]; then npx ./node_modules/humanifyjs openai "$FILE" ; fi; done
